Package back.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
back.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionListener
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionListener
Client TCP client which can send and receive messages, thanks to another thread
Author:
balgourdin, gdelambert, malami
